text: Kiril Dzhorov (; born 12 August 1975) is a retired Bulgarian footballer who played as a defender. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian footballers Category:First Professional Football League (Bulgaria) players Category:FC Vihren Sandanski players Category:F.C. title: Kiril Dzhorov
